text: Mac Studio is a Mac that was announced at "Peek Performance" event on 8 March 2022. It was released on 18 March 2022. It costs $1999 for M1 Max, 32GB RAM and 512GB storage and $3999 for M1 Ultra, 64GB RAM and 1TB storage. Category:Apple products released in 2020s Category:Apple hardware
title: Mac Studio
